'''TEC''' 1D+1/4D == '''Special Abilities:''' == :'''Blindsight:''' Anx have exceptionally poor eyesight, and instead use sense organs along their crests, knees, and elbows to "smell" the world around them. :'''Communication at a Distance:''' Anx speak in a booming, low-frequency language that other Anx can hear up to five kilometers away. :'''Increased Hand-to-Hand Damage:''' Due to their physiology, Anx characters add +1D to their Strength score when rolling their hand-to-hand damage. == '''Story Factors:''' == :'''Fin Cloaks:''' The skin and fins of an Anx change colors to reflect their emotions, making an Anx's basic mood easy to decipher. As a result, Anx characters often wear fin cloaks that make it more difficult for others to interpret their emotions. An Anx without a fin cloak suffers a -2D penalty to all Bargain and Con skill checks. :'''Size:''' 4 meters tall on average :'''Move:''' 12/14 == '''Personality:''' == :Sociable creatures, they possessed an incredible devotion to any group of which they felt a part. To compensate for poor eyesight, Anx had an acute sense of smell. They also tended to possess a formidable knowledge of anatomy, especially nerves, muscles and bone structures, making them dangerous unarmed combatants and skilled warriors, capable of defeating most opponents. == '''Physical Description:''' == :A large, reptilian species.  They stand an average 4 meters in height.  They have destinctive mood sensitive crests, pointed heads and tails.  The species has poor eyesight but makes up for this with an acute sense of smell.  Their language is comprised of low-frequency tones produced by the sins cavity found in their large headcrest.
